DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate potential effect CP 690,550 pharmacokinetics metformin , probe drug organic cationic transport .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Of CP-690,550 On The Pharmacokinetics Of Metformin In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Adult healthy male and/or female ( non child bear potential ) subject . Subjects clinically significant systemic laboratory abnormality . Subjects clinically significant infection within past 3 month . Women childbearing potential .
